remarks: Limit of a continuous function on an open subinterval.  Lower bound version.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
fourierdlem32.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem32.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem32.altb $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
fourierdlem32.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( ( A (,) B ) -cn-> CC ) ) $.
fourierdlem32.l $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( F limCC A ) ) $.
fourierdlem32.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem32.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR ) $.
fourierdlem32.cltd $e |- ( ph -> C < D ) $.
fourierdlem32.ss $e |- ( ph -> ( C (,) D ) C_ ( A (,) B ) ) $.
fourierdlem32.y $e |- Y = if ( C = A , R , ( F ` C ) ) $.
fourierdlem32.j $e |- J = ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t ( A [,) B ) ) $.
fourierdlem32 $p |- ( ph -> Y e. ( ( F |` ( C (,) D ) ) limCC C ) ) $.
